article: It is a miracle ! After 23 years in a wheelchair, Delia Knox walks again. She was paralysed from the waist down in a car accident in 1987. Then this year, Mrs Knox _ stood up and walked. And the 46-year-old has been walking ever since. Mrs. Knox, whose " _ moment" was filmed and has become a _ YouTube hit ,said: "This has _ my world upside down. I can stand in my kitchen and walk around my _ . I'm like a little kid seeing things that were once so _ now seem so small. I am seeing the power of belief not just in my life _ but all over the world as a result of this miracle." The accident which _ her to a wheelchair for 23 years happened when she was on her way home _ after a church service with her sister. She was a passenger in the car then. Mrs. Knox _ all feeling in her legs and had almost given up hope of _ again. When she agreed to attend a fitness center earlier this year, she had no _ healings were happening.  She said: "I wanted to get benefit from some kind of _ and to see my good friends. I knew it was not a professional sports club _ I didn't know healings were taking place. Then all of a sudden I felt a voice which I knew was saying to me, "35 Get up ", and I felt feeling in my legs and then _ came on me to walk. I wasn't going to let anyone take this away from me and I knew this was my night to walk out of the _ . I walked and walked and walked and felt I had _ another kingdom. I ended up on the floor and someone was touching my _ and I could feel my knees for the first time. They were _ and clicking into place."
